    • MyJio

    One-stop destination for
    all things Jio

    Manage your accounts, watch movies,
    play the latest songs, back up data, play games and do much more.

    Easily manage your mobile and JioFiber services

    Now manage your mobile and JioFiber services with ease. Do more with the new JioFiber mini-app! Recharge, get real-time usage details, manage multiple accounts, set up JioAutoPay, and do much more.

    Payments simplified with Jio UPI

    Create your @jio handle and own the handle you love! Send money or scan QR codes, pay at shops, manage your UPI IDs, make instant bill payments, with the power of UPI.

    JioMart – Experience online grocery shopping like never before

    An app-based supermarket for all your shopping needs. No minimum order and free contactless home delivery across 200+ cities. Enjoy the best deals, offers, and a wide selection of products at unbelievable prices!

    Search at your fingertips

    Search for the best plans, movies, music, games, and much more in a single place. Directly type what you are looking for in the search bar and it's there on your screen in a moment.

    Ask HelloJio about Jio

    The advanced voice assistant to solve all your problems. Ask for balance check or troubleshoot issues or find the latest movies. It’s that simple!

    India's go-to app for entertainment!

    Entertainment has got a new address now! For blockbuster movies, chartbusters songs, and popular games, India now turns to MyJio. Bundled with other services on MyJio, JioCinema, JioSaavn, and JioGames are providing full-on entertainment to users across India.

    A portable newsstand for you - JioNews

    Keep yourself updated with the latest happenings around the world. Stream live news channels, get 13+ languages from top news sources, and watch popular videos, and read trending articles from 80+ popular newspapers and magazines on the go

    Play, win, and get rewarded!

    A library of games and boxes full of amazing prizes – just for you! Play exciting games, participate in fun quizzes and win exciting prizes and rewards.

    JioEngage is the customer engagement arm of Jio

    We help our clients connect with their customers/viewers by providing them interactive engagements/experiences. We have been working with various brands, broadcasters, platforms and agencies since 2017.

    Smart app, smart feature

    HelloJio

    Use voice search to get answers to queries.

    Vouchers

    Recharge in a single click. Buy and transfer vouchers to family and friends.

    Universal QR

    Link accounts, save contacts and do much more.

    Usage details

    Check details of Voice, Data and SMS consumption.

    JioAutoPay

    Setup JioAutoPay and never miss a recharge.

    JioCare

    Get answers to your queries. Refer helpful tips, videos, FAQs.

    Statement

    View and download account statement for last 180 days.

    I was under impression that MyJio is for some premium plan buyers until my friend told me that it is free for every Jio customer. It feels great to be eligible for so many digital experiences just by recharging my mobile number.
